lead_paragraph: PRICE--Robert. The Board of Trustees and staff of The Metropolitan Council on Jewish Poverty mourn the passing of Robert Price. Robert Price was the father of our immediate past President Steven Price, who has been an active supporter, trustee and advocate for the poor for many years. We extend our deepest sympathies to Steven, Tina and the entire Price family during their time of loss. Abraham Biderman, President, Joseph Shenker, Co-Chair, Merryl Tisch, Co-Chair, Metropolitan Council On Jewish Poverty Board of Trustees, Alan Schoor, Chief Executive Officer 1/3
